Maryam Touzani (a mụrụ n'abalị 18, ọnwa Julaị, afọ 1980) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme egwuregwu. A maara ya nke ọma dịka onye nduzi nke ihe nkiri Adam.
A mụrụ Touzani n'afọ 1980 na Tangier. N'afọ 2003, ọ nwetara nzere masta na Media Communication and Journalism na London
Mgbe ahụ ọ malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye nta akụkọ na-elekwasị anya na ihe nkiri.
Na mbụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-ede ihe nkiri ma na-eduzi ụfọdụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na nke akụkọ
N'afọ 2011, o mere obere Quand ils dorment

Ọ meriri ihe nrite iri na asaa, gụnyere nke ndị ọka ikpe pụrụ iche na Huesca International Film Festival, mmemme ruru eru maka Oscars. Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2014, o mere ihe ngosi mbụ ya bụ Sous Ma Peau Vieille
Ihe nkiri ahụ ghọrọ ihe a ma ama na Morocco, nke kwurịtara banyere ịgba akwụna na Morocco
Site na ihe ịga nke ọma nke ihe ngosi a, ọ gbanwere ya ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri na aha Much Loved nke e wepụtara n'afọ 2015
Ọ bụ di ya Nabil Ayouch duziri ihe nkiri ahụ ebe ọ bụ ya mere edemede ahụ.
Na ngwụcha afọ 2015, o mere obere oge nke abụọ ya bụ Aya va à la plage
Ihe nkiri ahụ na-agba gburugburu akụkụ ọzọ nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, n'oge a banyere mmegbu nke obere ụmụaka dịka ndị ọrụ ụlọ.
N'afọ 2017, ya na di ya, onye nduzi Nabil Ayouch dere ihe nkiri Razzia

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ 'Salima' na ihe nkiri ahụ. Mgbe ahụ, n'afọ 2019, Touzani duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Adam A họọrọ ihe nkiri ahụ maka Cannes Film Festival na ngalaba 'Un Certain Regard'. Mgbe e mesịrị na 12th Festival International du Film Francophone de Namur nke Angoulême
A họọrọ ya dịka ntinye Moroccan maka Best International Feature Film na 92nd Academy Awards, mana a họpụtabeghị ya.
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ ghọrọ onye otu Academy of Oscars.
N'afọ 2022, e nyere ihe nkiri ya The Blue Caftan Un Certain Regard FIPRESCI Prize na 2022 Cannes Film Festival.
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Franco-Moroccan ibe ya bụ Nabil Ayouch.
